description.displayText: We hired Mariana for babysitting our daughter and she was fabulous!! She went above and beyond taking excellent care of our daughter, giving her medication, giving her snacks & dinner, doing nap time/bedtime routine, and cleaning up/organizing the toys they played with. Our daughter warmed up to her quickly and she was very nice. We would definitely hire her to come back again any time.
description.originalText: We hired Mariana for babysitting our daughter and she was fabulous!! She went above and beyond taking excellent care of our daughter, giving her medication, giving her snacks & dinner, doing nap time/bedtime routine, and cleaning up/organizing the toys they played with. Our daughter warmed up to her quickly and she was very nice. We would definitely hire her to come back again any time.

description.displayText: She is very intelligent with kids, knows how to handle them very well. Example my son has ADHD and know  how to take care of kids with disability. Very good, love how she deals, plays with kids, and have cousins and a kid of her own.  Love to enjoy the outside with  kids. Please hire her. No questions ask. Highly recommend Mariana as a good sitter for kids.  Thanks sitter you the best.
